fly.description: The identifier of the fly within the chamber

marking.description: The identifier of the fly within the chamber

line.description: Verified as legal line name in SAGE. New line names may be added to SAGE using the web interface.

effector.description: Verified as legal effector name in SAGE.

gender.description: The gender or genders of the flies. m=male, f=female

cross_date.description: Date cross was made to generate this set of flies.

content.description: Genotype of flies. Typically auto-generated from line and effector.

rearing_protocol.description: Name of an XML file that has values for rearing parameters (see bottom of page for protocol fields) whenever a rearing protocol variable is changed, user will need to create new rearing protocol file and give it a new name .

handling_protocol.description: Name of an XML file that has values for pre-assay handling parameters (see bottom of page for protocol fields) whenever a handling protocol variable is changed, user will need to create new rearing protocol file and give it a new name .

handler_sorting.description: Name of the person who sorted the flies.

handler_cross.description: Name of the person who handled the flies pre-experiment.

housing.description: Social environment in which fly was raised. Group (G) or Single (S).

hours_sorted.description: Time in hours between sorting and experiment start.

datetime_sorting.description: Date and time at which the flies were sorted.
